name: Magical Posts Display – Elementor Advanced Posts widgets
author: Noor alam

sections.description:
With just one click, you can easily generate posts Slider, posts carousels, posts Grids, posts accordions, posts tabs, posts tickers, and Categories & Tags Filters for Posts, Pages, and Custom Post Types. This addon helps you showcase your content in various formats, providing an engaging user experience for your visitors. Magical Posts Display is an Elementor addon that simplifies the creation of interactive content displays. Magical Posts Display is compatible with all custom post types.

✨ – Your All-in-One Tool for News, Magazines, and Blogs

Magical Posts Display is your ultimate solution for creating amazing News, Magazine, and Blog websites. Think of it as a supercharged plugin that does it all, whether you’re building a blog or a news and magazine site.

With Magical Posts Display, you get fantastic features like the Dynamic Site Builder, Popular Posts, Related Posts, Ajax Filter and Pagination, Post Carousel, Post slider, and much more. Now, with added support for Pages and Custom Post Types, it’s your secret weapon for unlocking your website’s full potential.

See live preview

Live preview Magical Posts Display

Upgrade Pro For All Features

View Pro version

See Short video

Magical Posts Display comes with a range of awesome Elementor widgets that make it easy to display your posts in unique and visually appealing ways.

Magical Posts Display is a user-friendly addon that offers many different ways to display your site posts. Our Elementor widgets allow you to customize and set new options for each Magical Posts item, giving you complete control over your content display. In addition, our addon supports post meta, categories, tags, comments, timestamps, and more, making it easy to create a personalized and engaging user experience for your visitors.

Most powerful features:

  • Easily display posts, pages, and custom posts anywhere.
  • Drag & Drop Elementor page builder Widgets.
  • You can edit every single item
  • Posts Group Grid
  • Posts Categories Filter Live preview
  • Posts Tags Filter Live preview
  • Posts Slider Live preview
  • Posts Ticker (Latest News) Live preview
  • Posts carousel. Live preview | Video Tutorial
  • Posts grid card. Live preview | Video Tutorial
  • Posts Accordion. Live preview | Video Tutorial
  • Posts Tab. Live preview | Video Tutorial
  • Awesome Posts list. Live preview | Video Tutorial
  • Posts list card. Live preview | Video Tutorial
  • Categories gird.
  • Popular posts widget with image.
  • Recent posts widget with image.
  • Posts grid show by shortcode.
  • Posts time show.
  • Posts category show.
  • Posts tag show.
  • All options show hide features.
  • User-friendly Editor.

Translations

  • English

Privacy Policy

Magical Posts Display – Elementor Advanced Posts widgets uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Appsero SDK does not gather any data by default. The SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how Appsero collects and uses this data.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Magical Posts Display plugin!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the magical-posts-display.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the magical-posts-display.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Magical Posts Display.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Login to your WordPress admin area.
  • Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top.
  • Click the Upload plugin button at the top.
  • Click the Choose File button and locate the magical-posts-display.zip file on your machine and click the Install Now button.
  • On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.
sections.faq:
How Can I use Magical Posts Display Plugin?

You can easily use the plugin by Elementor page builder editor. If you go add new or edit page then you will get all Elementor widgets for use.

How do I display Pages and Custom Post Types using Magical Posts Display?

To display Pages and Custom Post Types, simply select the desired content type from the settings within the Elementor editor. You can then customize the display options just as you would for Posts.

Can I customize the look and feel of my content displays with Magical Posts Display?

Yes, you can customize the look and feel of your content displays using the various Elementor widgets that come with the addon. You can change the layout, colors, fonts, and more to create a unique and visually appealing content display

Can I display posts from a specific category with Magical Posts Display?

Yes, Magical Posts Display supports posts categories, allowing you to display posts from a specific category. You can use the Elementor widgets to filter posts based on categories and tags and create a more personalized user experience for your visitors

Do I need any coding skills to use Magical Posts Display?

No, you don’t need any coding skills to use Magical Posts Display. The addon comes with various Elementor widgets that allow you to create stunning content displays without any coding knowledge. Simply select the widget you want to use, customize it to your liking, and publish your content display.

Can I use Magical Posts Display on multiple websites?

Yes, you can use Magical Posts Display on multiple websites with a single license. The addon offers a flexible licensing system that allows you to use it on an unlimited number of websites, making it an excellent choice for web developers and agencies who create websites for multiple clients.
